name: Moero Downhill Night

files.file1: N/A:Please select the JAST USA archive

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Moero Downhill Night Type R/Moero Downhill Night Type R.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the JAST USA archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Moero Downhill Night Type R/Moero Downhill Night Type
    R.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $CACHE/Moero 1 Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
